about_the_game:
PuPaiPo Space Deluxe Original Soundtrack
Composed by Jaime "Rabid Orange"

Soundtrack contains:

01 - Important Pizza News
02 - PuPaiPo Space DX
03 - Waiting for the pizza DX
04 - Waiting even more for the pizza
05 - Touch the Stars with Me DX
06 - Spatial Chase DX
07 - Highway to the Nebuloid DX
08 - Asteroid Ring DX
09 - Frosty Planet
10 - Icy Shoot-out
11 - Flooded Planet
12 - Bubbly Shoot-out
13 - Milky Way
14 - This might be a good battle theme for a certain octopus that likes to fight in space deluxe edition
15 - Cassiopeia
16 - Intergalactic Clash
17 - Dangerous Area DX
18 - The Pizza Thief DX
19 - Finally! You Got the Pizza!
20 - Let's Party!
21 - Time Rifting through the Universe
